configuration.name: 项目细分图
configuration.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (c.c_industry2 IS NULL OR c.c_industry2='') THEN '未知' ELSE c.c_industry2 END c_industry2, count(p.c_id) c_count from t_project p INNER JOIN t_customer c ON p.c_customer_id=c.c_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_industry i ON c.c_industry2=i.c_type2 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY c.c_industry2 ORDER BY i.c_sort_id
